pr_title: WFLY-13147 Avoid processing deployments multiple times in Weld subsys…

timeline.bodyText: This comment is confusing because for using the example values the code would amount to "123abc.ear".endsWith("deployment.123abc.ear") which would never be true.
timeline.author: bstansberry

replies.bodyText: Oh yea, it's the other way around of course, my bad. Either way, I wasn't planning to keep it here, it was just a temporary explanation of why the matching works based on my debugging...
replies.author: manovotn

timeline.message: WFLY-13147 Avoid processing deployments multiple times in Weld subsystem.

timeline.bodyText: My only "maybe" suggestion is earlier in this method when looping through the DeploymentUnits, built up a Set containing "deployment." + d.getName().  Then here just do a contains check against that set.
timeline.author: bstansberry
